page.title: 11SHOPPING IN ABERAERON
page.content: {May 17th }We carried out a shopping survey of 40 people we found shopping in Aberaeron. We asked 20 locals and 20 tourists. {LOCALS } 12 of our 20 lived in Aberaeron itself and the others came from nearby villages eg.Llanon, Llanrystud,Llanarth,Ciliau Aeron, Aberarth,Gilfachreda and Cilcennin. They bought their{food}from Aberaeron but travelled over 25 miles or more to Swansea, Aberystwyth, Cardigan for more {expensive items. Shopping can be very difficult as we have{little variety of goods especially expensive items, furniture electrical goods,clothes etc. {TOURISTS } They came from all over Britain and were mainly interested in buying Welsh souvenirs eg. woollen products,local pottery, slate products, Welsh rock,honey ice cream.
